subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1. The system for coordinating various components of poverty and MDG monitoring and assessment system in place
2. MDGs are localised in pilot areas 
3. Poverty and MDG Monitoring System operational 
4. Data  base of integrated civil registration established
5. Participatory decision-making enhanced
subproject.title: Poverty and MDG Monitoring
